MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L32 postcode area of Liverpool, affecting properties in Sefton Close and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10.20PM. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1.30AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11.22PM on 14th October 2020.
